title: No Love For a Dead Man - Hub
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=“If I say something real sappy will it kill the mood?”
]]
=====

= An Ongoing Project
]]

[[=]]
[[div style="margin: auto; width: 800px;"]]
+++ [[size 120%]]Starring Dr. Benjamin Kondraki (//as A Dead Man//)[[/size]]


A four act series about people ruining their lives and never getting an opportunity to fix things. Currently ongoing.
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[div class="notation"]]
**RECCOMMENDED PRE-READING**
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/yesterday Yesterday]
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-king-is-dead The King is Dead]
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/portraits-of-your-father Portraits Of Your Father ]
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/blackened Blackened]
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/olympia-project Olympia Project]
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/incident-4166-b Incident 4166-B]
[[/div]]

[[div class="scp-image-block block-center" style="width:100%;"]]
[[=image https://64.media.tumblr.com/b2d4feec6814c9dbe30df71fa4270c6c/16c4a60c06b7194c-19/s540x810/917f0f864022f063e7911b48adce97438c710206.jpg]]
[[div class="scp-image-caption" style="width:100%;"]]
These Walls Have Mold in Them, Art By [https://www.tumblr.com/possible-raccoon Possible-Raccoon]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]



[[div class="paper"]]
[[=]]
[[div style="margin: auto; width: 800px;"]]
++ ACT 1 - THESE WALLS HAVE MOLD IN THEM
++++ Starring: Dr. Charles Gears (//as Nobody in Particular//) and Dr. Alto Clef (//as SCP-4231-B//)
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Part 1: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/lets-get-you-home Let's Get You Home]** - In which Dr. Gears walks into a bar.
**Part 2: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/i-need-you-to-leave I Need You to Leave]** - In which Dr. Gears makes a series of very bad choices.
**Part 3: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/this-is-not-a-place-of-honor This is Not a Place of Honor]** - In which Dr. Gears participates in improvisational theater.
**Part 4: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/nobody-runs-site-19 Nobody Runs Site-19]** - In which several loose ends are tied.
**Paty 5: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/tomorrow-and-tomorrow-and-tomorrow Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow Again]** - In which the world ends. 
[[/div]]


[[div class="paper"]]
[[=]]
[[div style="margin: auto; width: 800px;"]]
++ ACT 2 - EVERY WRONG CHOICE
++++ Starring: Draven Kondraki (//as A Foundation Dog//) and Alison Chao (//as A Complete Hypocrite//)
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Part 1: Sunk Cost Fallacy** - In which ???
**Part 2: Red Herring Fallacy -** In which ??? 
**Part 3: Circular Argument Fallacy -** In which ???
**Part 4: Ad Hominem Fallacy -** In which ???
**Part 5: Argument from Fallacy -** In which ???
[[/div]]


[[div class="paper"]]
[[=]]
[[div style="margin: auto; width: 800px;"]]
++ INTERMISSION - ANDREA ADAMS DIES AT THE END
++++ Starring: Andrea Adams (//as Project Olympia//) and Kain "Pathos" Crow (//as A Very Lonely Man//)
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Part 1: Two Days in a Very Small Room** - In which ???
**Part 2: Burn Every Bridge** - In which ???
**Part 3: How it Was Always Going to End** - In which ???
[[/div]]


[[div class="paper"]]
[[=]]
[[div style="margin: auto; width: 800px;"]]
++ ACT 3 - [[span style="color:#0099ff;"]]HOUSE[[/span]] OF GOD
++++ Starring: Meridiana Wojciechoski (//as Whoever She Wants to be//) and Doe (//as Who She Always Was//)
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Part 1: Exodus 20:12** - ???
**Part 2: John 4:48** - ???
**Part 3: Revelation 20:11** - ???
**Part 4: Leviticus 14:34** - ???
**Part 5: Genesis 3:23** - ???
[[/div]]


[[div class="paper"]]
[[=]]
[[div style="margin: auto; width: 800px;"]]
++ ACT 4 - THIS IS NOT FOR YOU
++++ Starring: Factotum Network (//as O5-1//)
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

**Part 1: Who's O5-1 Anyway?** - In which ???
**Part 2: Fear and Tamlin** - In which ???
**Part 3: Nothing and Nobody of Note** - In which ???
**Part 4: As of Yet Untitled** - In which ???
**Part 5: Queen of Nothing** - In which ???
[[/div]]
